snippet: Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain defeated Brazil's Rogerio Dutra Silva 6-3, 6-1 on Monday to reach the second round of the Ecuador Open....
lead_paragraph: Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain defeated Brazil's Rogerio Dutra Silva 6-3, 6-1 on Monday to reach the second round of the Ecuador Open.

headline.print_headline: Latin American Clay-Court Swing Kicks Off in Ecuador
headline.main: Latin American Clay-Court Swing Kicks Off in Ecuador
